item.title: How to Fetch and Convert Most Web Fonts
item.description: Every once in a while you need to see a font in action before actually purchase it. Thanks to JavaScript and the modern web, we can live preview fonts from a plethora of font foundries out there. This will only work with sites that offer a live preview, or are using the font in question on their site. Let’s Begin For our purposes, the following will be helpful in accomplishing our task:
